metadata.name: ShimCache Flush
metadata.comment: Detects actions that clear the local ShimCache and remove forensic evidence

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('rundll32')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('apphelp.dll')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('shimflushcache')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('#250'))) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('rundll32')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('kernel32.dll')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('baseflushappcompatcache')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('#46'))))

output.summary: Detects actions that clear the local ShimCache and remove forensic evidence

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.name, process.cmd_line, process.parent_process.cmd_line False positive: Unknown Reference: https://medium.com/@blueteamops/shimcache-flush-89daff28d15e
